subprocess_flow.description: The Product Management team analyzes the current business strategy to identify key objectives and priorities for the upcoming Program Increment (PI). This involves reviewing market trends, customer feedback, and competitive analysis to ensure that the program backlog aligns with the overall business direction. The team also assesses any new business opportunities or regulatory requirements that may impact the program backlog.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure alignment with business objectives.
subprocess_flow.scope: Analysis of business strategy and market trends.
governance_requirements: Stakeholder review of business strategy summary

subprocess_flow.description: Based on the business strategy analysis, the Product Management team refines the program vision to articulate the desired future state of the product. This involves defining the key themes and objectives for the upcoming PI, ensuring that they align with the overall business goals. The team also identifies any potential risks or dependencies that may impact the program vision.
success_criteria: Key themes and objectives are identified
subprocess_flow.purpose: To articulate the desired future state of the product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Refinement of program vision and identification of key themes.

subprocess_flow.description: The Product Management team identifies potential features that align with the refined program vision and key themes. This involves brainstorming sessions, reviewing customer feedback, and analyzing market trends to generate a comprehensive list of potential features. The team also considers any technical constraints or dependencies that may impact the feasibility of each feature.
success_criteria: Comprehensive list of potential features is generated
subprocess_flow.purpose: To generate a comprehensive list of potential features.
subprocess_flow.scope: Identification of potential features and creation of descriptions.

subprocess_flow.description: The Product Management team prioritizes the identified features based on their alignment with the program vision, business value, and technical feasibility. This involves using a prioritization framework such as Weighted Shortest Job First (WSJF) or MoSCoW to rank the features and determine which ones should be included in the upcoming PI. The team also considers any dependencies or constraints that may impact the prioritization process.
success_criteria: Features are prioritized based on business value and technical feasibility
subprocess_flow.purpose: To prioritize features based on business value and technical feasibility.
subprocess_flow.scope: Prioritization of features and creation of ranking.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of prioritization with stakeholders

governance_requirements: Stakeholder review of prioritized feature list

subprocess_flow.description: For each prioritized feature, the Product Management team defines clear and measurable acceptance criteria to ensure that the feature meets the desired requirements. This involves collaborating with stakeholders to define the specific conditions that must be met for the feature to be considered complete. The team also considers any potential risks or dependencies that may impact the acceptance criteria.
success_criteria: Acceptance criteria are clearly defined for each feature
subprocess_flow.purpose: To define clear and measurable acceptance criteria for each feature.
subprocess_flow.scope: Definition of acceptance criteria and creation of acceptance tests.
end_conditions: Acceptance criteria for each feature completed

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of acceptance criteria with stakeholders

subprocess_flow.description: The Development Teams estimate the effort required to develop and test each feature. This involves using estimation techniques such as story points or t-shirt sizing to assign a relative size to each feature. The team also considers any technical complexities or dependencies that may impact the estimation process. The System Architect provides guidance on architectural runway and technical feasibility.
success_criteria: Effort estimates are completed for each feature
subprocess_flow.purpose: To estimate the effort required to develop and test each feature.
subprocess_flow.scope: Estimation of feature effort and assignment of story points.
triggers: Acceptance criteria for each feature completed
end_conditions: Effort estimates for each feature completed

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of estimates with development teams

governance_requirements: Development Team review of effort estimates

subprocess_flow.description: The Product Management team refines the program backlog based on the prioritized features, acceptance criteria, and effort estimates. This involves creating user stories for each feature, adding them to the program backlog, and ensuring that they are properly tagged and categorized. The team also identifies any dependencies or constraints that may impact the program backlog.
success_criteria: Program backlog is refined with user stories
User stories are properly tagged and categorized
subprocess_flow.purpose: To refine the program backlog with user stories.
subprocess_flow.scope: Refinement of program backlog and creation of user stories.
triggers: Effort estimates for each feature completed
end_conditions: User stories for each feature completed

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of program backlog with stakeholders

subprocess_flow.description: The Product Management team prepares the inputs for the upcoming PI Planning session. This involves creating a draft PI plan, identifying any potential risks or dependencies, and communicating the program vision and key themes to the Agile Release Train (ART). The team also ensures that all necessary documentation and resources are available for the PI Planning session.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To prepare the inputs for the upcoming PI Planning session.
subprocess_flow.scope: Preparation of PI Planning inputs and creation of draft PI plan.
triggers: User stories for each feature completed

step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of PI Planning inputs with stakeholders

governance_requirements: Stakeholder review of PI Planning inputs
